nodes.bodyText: maybe good to specify from what cBioPortal version this will be a requirement. We could rephrase it to "a data access token is required soon. Then we can merge this to master. The master branch gets automatically deployed to docs.cbioportal.org
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,13 @@
+# Introduction
+
+A data access token is required to use OncoKB. Please review OncoKB [terms](https://www.oncokb.org/terms)

nodes.bodyText:
I'm not sure if auth is the best place to put this. It's more like an integration and has little to do with cBioPortal auth. Maybe we should add it to 2.3 Customization. That's where we for instance mention CIVIC and others: https://docs.cbioportal.org/2.3-customization/portal.properties-reference.
It does feel slightly different from customization in that it's more integration with other web services. Could also re-organize customization a bit and create new section 2.4 Integration with other web services. Matchminer and CIVIC could maybe go there as well
